Verses: 1 raajaavin Irudhayam Karththarin Kaiyil Neerkkaalgalaippolirukkiradhu; Adhaith Thamadhu Siththaththinpadi Avar Thiruppugiraar.
2 manushanudaiya Vazhiyellaam Avan Paarvaikku Semmaiyaagath Thondrum; Karththaro Irudhayangalai Niruththuppaarkkiraar.
3 baliyiduvadhaippaarkkilum, Needhiyum Niyaayamum Seyvadhe Karththarukkup Piriyam.
4 mettimaiyaana Paarvaiyum, Agandhaiyaana Manamumulla Dhunmaarkkar Podum Velichcham Paavame.
5 jaakkiradhaiyullavanudaiya Ninaivugal Selvaththukkum, Padharugiravanudaiya Ninaivugal Dhariththiraththukkum Edhuvaagum.
6 poinaavinaal Porulai Sambaadhippadhu Saavaith Thedugiravargal Vidugira Suvaasampolirukkum.
7 dhunmaarkkar Niyaayanseyya Manadhillaadhirukkirapadiyaal, Avargal Paazhkkadikkappattuppovaargal.
8 kutramullavan Than Vazhigalil Maarupaadullavan; Suththamullavano Than Kiriyaiyil Semmaiyaanavan.
9 sandaikkaariyode Oru Periyaveettil Kudiyiruppadhaippaarkkilum, Veettinmel Oru Moolaiyil Thangiyiruppadhe Nalam.
10 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Manam Pollaappai Seyya Virumbum; Avan Kangalil Avan Ayalaanukku Irakkankidaiyaadhu.
11 pariyaasakkaaranaith Dhandikkumbodhu Pedhai Gnaanamadaivaan; Gnaanavaan Podhikkappadumbodhu Arivadaivaan.
12 needhiparar Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Veettai Gavaniththup Paarkkiraar; Dhunmaarkkaraith Theengil Kavizhththuppoduvaar.
13 ezhaiyin Kookkuralukkuth Than Seviyai Adaiththukkollugiravan, Thaanum Saththamittuk Kooppidumbodhu Ketkappadamaattaan.
14 andharangamaaik Kodukkappatta Vegumadhi Kobaththaith Thanikkum; Madiyilulla Paridhaanam Kurodhaththai Aatrum.
15 niyaayantheerppadhu Needhimaanukku Sandhoshamum, Akkiramakkaararukko Azhivumaam.
16 vivegaththin Vazhiyai Vittuth Thappinadakkira Manushan Seththavargalin Koottaththil Thaabarippaan.
17 sitrinbappiriyan Thariththiranaavaan; Madhubaanaththaiyum Enneyaiyum Virumbugiravan Aisuvariyavaanaavadhillai.
18 needhimaanukku Badhilaagath Dhunmaarkkanum, Semmaiyaanavanukku Badhilaaga Dhrogiyum Meetkumporulaavaargal.
19 sandaikkaariyum Kobakkaariyumaana Sthreeyudan Kudiyiruppadhaip Paarkkilum Vanaandharaththil Kudiyiruppadhu Nalam.
20 vendiya Thiraviyamum Enneyum Gnaanavaanudaiya Vaasasthalaththil Undu; Moodano Adhai Selavazhiththuppodugiraan.
21 needhiyaiyum Dhayaiyaiyum Pinpatrugiravan Jeevanaiyum Needhiyaiyum Magimaiyaiyum Kandadaivaan.
22 balavaangaludaiya Pattanaththin Madhilai Gnaanamullavan Erippidiththu, Avargal Nambina Aranai Idiththuppoduvaan.
23 than Vaayaiyum Than Naavaiyum Kaakkiravan Than Aaththumaavai Idukkangalukku Vilakkik Kaakkiraan.
24 agangaaramum Idumbumullavanukkup Pariyaasakkaaranendru Peyar, Avan Agandhaiyaana Sinaththode Nadakkiraan.
25 somberiyin Kaigal Velaiseyya Sammadhiyaadhadhinaal, Avan Aasai Avanaik Kollum.
26 avan Naaldhorum Aavaludan Ichchikkiraan; Needhimaano Pisiniththanamillaamal Koduppaan.
27 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Bali Aruvaruppaanadhu; Adhaith Thurchsindhaiyode Seluththinaalo Eththanai Adhigamaai Aruvarukkappadum.
28 poisaatchikkaaran Kettuppovaan; Sevikodukkiravano Eppozhudhum Pesaththakkavanaavaan.
29 dhunmaarkkan Than Mugaththaik Kadinappaduththugiraan; Semmaiyaanavano Than Vazhiyai Nerppaduththugiraan.
30 karththarukku Virodhamaana Gnaanamumillai, Buththiyumillai, Aalosanaiyumillai.
31 kudhirai Yuththanaalukku Aayaththamaakkappadum; Jeyamo Karththaraal Varum.
